name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The girl in the video has been identified as Noa, who was at a local peace music festival when Hamas launched the attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Another woman attacked at the festival was from Germany, Shani Luke, 30, a mother.
In a widely circulated video today, her body was dragged back to Gaza naked by Hamas, with one Hamas using her body as a footrest and another pulling her hair.
